%  Bowley Cost-of-Living Index for Great Britain, 1846-1914 (1914=100)
%  Table 9 of Price section, British Historical Statistics, Brian R. Mitchell
%  The 1914 figure is for January-June.

1847  110
1848   96
1849   93

1850   94
1851   94
1852   96

1859  108
